issue.title: [GLib][Dataset] Change prefix to gadataset_ from gad_
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13068](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13068). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because we choose gaflight_ for Apache Arrow Flight GLib.
